mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date, b.user_no, u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by reg_date desc

select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no
and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by no desc
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date regDate, b.user_no userNo, u.name userName from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and title like '%'||#{value}||'%' order by no desc
select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') reg_date, b.content, b.user_no from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
select b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date b.user_no u.name from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and title like '%' || #{value} || '%' order by no desc
